description.translate: She may have disappeared, but her generosity never vanished.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Le présent d'Ithil première\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Peut-être disparut-elle, mais \"}","{\"text\":\"§7jamais sa générosité ne s'effaça.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7She may have disappeared, but\"}","{\"text\":\"§7her generosity never vanished.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7HER§c-2\"}"]}}
